name: Sakal Social Foundation
briefDescription: Sakal Social Foundation was founded on the platform of being ‘a mediumof social change’, the contribution and championing of social causeshas become ingrained into the ethos of the Sakal Media Group, and hasbecome central to the identity of the group itself. While the seeds ofthis spirit were planted by the founder of Sakal, Dr. N. B. Parulekar,it has been nurtured by the Chairman Pratap Pawar and ManagingDirector Abhijit Pawar.
